statements: SELECT * FROM guest_demographics WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM guest_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT guest_id, email FROM guest_demographics WHERE check_in_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM guest_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM guest_demographics WHERE check_out_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM guest_demographics WHERE gender='Male' AND age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM guest_demographics WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY check_in_date ASC
SELECT * FROM guest_demographics WHERE gender='Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT guest_id, email, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guest_demographics WHERE age < 18 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY check_out_date DESC
SELECT guest_id, age, email, phone_number FROM guest_demographics WHERE first_name LIKE '%John%' OR last_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY guest_id ASC
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, guest_age FROM guests WHERE guest_age > 30;
SELECT guest_name, guest_gender FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE guest_age > 25 ORDER BY guest_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT guest_name, guest_gender FROM guests WHERE guest_age < 30 AND guest_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Online' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_age FROM guests WHERE guest_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY guest_age DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM GuestDemographics;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_email FROM GuestDemographics ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_age FROM GuestDemographics WHERE guest_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM ReservationHistory WHERE checkin_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_interests FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM GuestDemographics WHERE guest_age > 30 ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM GuestDemographics WHERE guest_age < 25 ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReservationHistory WHERE checkin_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, checkin_date, checkout_date FROM GuestDemographics JOIN ReservationHistory ON GuestDemographics.guest_id = ReservationHistory.guest_id;
SELECT campaign_name, target_interests FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE target_age_group = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_id, preference_value FROM guest_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'room_view';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM guests WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM guests ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT reservations.reservation_id, guests.first_name, guests.last_name, rooms.room_number FROM reservations INNER JOIN guests ON reservations.guest_id = guests.guest_id INNER JOIN rooms ON reservations.room_number = rooms.room_number ORDER BY reservations.check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT guest_name, age FROM guests WHERE country='USA'
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM guests WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM guests ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM guests
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM guests WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY guest_id DESC
SELECT * FROM guests WHERE country = 'USA' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM guests ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT guest_name, age FROM guests WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, country FROM guests WHERE age <= 25 ORDER BY country, guest_id
